name: Möbi's Trip
description:
Controls: Arrow keys or WASD and Spacebar

Note: The web version of this game is prone to glitches and performance issues. If you have trouble, please try the downloadable version.

Möbi the slime lives in a Möbius strip. Her world is twisted loop - if she goes too far one way, she'll find she's back at her starting point, but upside down!
Help Möbi travel through ten puzzle levels, and try for a best time on the online leaderboard!

This jam was created in its entirety for th 47th Ludum Dare Compo
